comment: The set of vertices of a graph without edges represented as an extensible structure with vertices as base set and no indexed edges. See ~ vtxvalsnop for the (degenerate) case where ` V = ( Base `` ndx ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.)
